product_name: Outdoor Research Essence T-Shirt - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The women's quick-drying, moisture-wicking Outdoor Research Essence T-Shirt will soon become your go-to fave for hiking and adventure travel. Dri-release(R) blends polyester and merino wool for superb moisture management properties and cottonlike comfort. Freshguard(R) treatment embedded in the yarn virtually eliminates odor and won't wash out. Raglan sleeves offer non-irritating, seamless comfort at the shoulders and allow freedom of movement. Shoulder seams are rolled forward, reducing bulk at the top of the shoulders for non-chafing comfort under backpack straps. Outdoor Research Essence T-Shirt is semifitted to enhance performance. Machine wash cold, tumble dry low; do not bleach. Closeout.
short_description: The women's quick-drying, moisture-wicking Outdoor Research Essence T-Shirt will soon become your go-to fave for hiking and adventure travel.
